alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Kershaw; Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 2:25PM EDT until May 21 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Fairfield County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Lancaster County in central South Carolina... Northwestern Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 225 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Great Falls, or 14 miles northeast of Winnsboro, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Heath Springs, Liberty Hill, Lake Wateree State Park, Irwin, Pleasant Hill, Bell Town Fire Station, Mitford, Faith Christian School and McDonald Green Elementary School. This includes Interstate 77 between mile markers 46 and 50. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. Severe thunderstorms can produce large capsizing waves and frequent lightning. If on or near Lake Wateree move away from the water and take shelter!
